welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Weinfelden, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes, rich history, and delicious wines. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our vibrant city has to offer. Cheers to a memorable visit!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Friedrichshafen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Altenrhein Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zurich Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Zurich Airport, primarily used for regional and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, no password required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hohenems-Dornbirn Airport is a modern and efficient facility, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Hohenems-Dornbirn Airport handles all freight and cargo operations, providing efficient and secure handling of goods.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport terminal.
